title: Baked Chicken Thighs
directions: Pat chicken thighs dry with paper towels.
Place chicken on a baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil.
Season evenly with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and paprika.
Arrange thighs skin-side up with space between pieces.
Bake uncovered for 35-45 minutes until skin is crisp and internal temp reaches 165F.
notes: Category: foundation Source: Self-Defense Cooking (original) Interactive: ratioLock=False, heatModule=True, panicButton=True, substitutionEngine=True Self-defense lesson: Drying the protein and using high heat teaches control under pressure: moisture management equals crisp results.
